thread.title: Spooktacular Halloween freebies and dining deals
thread.title_full: Spooktacular Halloween freebies and dining deals

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Spooktacular Halloween freebies and dining deals
text:
Spooktacular Halloween freebies and dining deals Wear a costume and get a $3 boorito at Chipotle after 5 p.m. on Halloween. Doreen Christensen Contact Reporter Sun Sentinel A spooktacular list of Halloween freebies and dining deals 
I've scared up a long list of freebies, events and dining deals for Halloween on Saturday, Oct. 31. 
Some offers, good at participating locations, are valid now through Sunday. No coupons are necessary unless otherwise noted. Call ahead to verify participation. 
As the skeleton would say, bone appetit! 
Applebees: Up to three free kids meals with an adult entree purchase when children wear costumes on Saturday at participating locations. 
Bass Pro Shops: Free 4-by-6 photos, crafts and trick-or-treating for kids Sunday through Saturday. 
Boynton Beach Mall: From 3 to 6 p.m. on Saturday, mall-wide trick or treating, games, kids activities, bounce houses and more. 
Bucca di Beppo: Coupons for free pasta on Halloween, BOGO lunch entrees (expires Oct. 30) and $20 off two entrees dining in or to go (expires Nov. 1). 
Chipotle: Score $3 burritos, bowls, tacos or salads with a costume after 5 p.m. on Saturday. Proceeds benefit Chipotle Cultivate Foundation. No coupon necessary. 
ComicFest: Free full sized and mini comic books at area comic book shops on Saturday. 
IHOP: Free scary face pancakes and coloring book for kids 12 and under from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. on Friday, Oct. 30 at participating locations. 
Jo-Ann Fabric: Free no-sew ideas for kids' costumes from Joann Fabric. 
Pollo Tropical: $1 Treat Book with coupons for free fountain drinks and meals savings redeemable in November. Proceeds benefit Make a Splash. 
Pumpkin stencils: Free pumpkin carving stencils, decorating ideas from Better Homes and Gardens. 
Target: Free $5 gift card, up to 40 percent off costumes and decorations. 
Tijuana Flats: Kids eat free with purchase of an adult entree when dining in only on Saturday. 
Wendy's: $1 Frosty books with five coupons for free Jr. Frostys to benefit the Dave Thomas Foundation. 
Like Doreen's Deals on Facebook ; follow Doreen Christensen on Twitter@PrettyGoodIdeas and sign up for Deals text alerts .
